ygData.subject: RE: New Weapon Sketches!
ygData.msgSnippet: They are not on the sisters island. I am looking for the island w/ the merchant that sells the sketches. I did find one other island near sisters island
ygData.messageBody:
They are not on the sisters island. I am looking for the island w/ the
merchant that sells the sketches. I did find one other island near sisters
island (Gornet's maybe?? the one w/ the Cyclops) with a merchant, but she is
the one selling the summoning spells.

I also stopped at the island on the way back from Kaladim (my map shows it
as boring island or something like that. I don't have the name here at
work), but there weren't any sketches being sold on that island either.

As for Allizwesaur, yes, that's who I saw, but I have no interest in him,
other than not being killed by him ;)

Thanks!

-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi [mailto:kaleusi@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 11:02 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] New Weapon Sketches!

From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>

>From: "Mitchell Okun" <Mitchell_Okun@...>
>About the sketches or the Lizard? I can tell you that that was the
> >Allizwesaur, a dinosaur who is the sole resident of that island. I
> >don't know if he's ever been killed, but he can double attack for >about
>200 pts each. Ouch.
>
>I am guessing that either Zach Reigh's isle or the Sisters are the >sellers
>of the sketches. I haven't found out yet, as i'm in >Everfrost and more
>interested in the Poison Vials right now anyway.
>
>- Nikolita, Floating Merchant

Don't think it's on the Isle of Sisterhood. Been all over that island, and
haven't found them yet. Never been to Zach Reigh's island though. Anyone
have the locs of this island?
